page.title: 12A modern school in Annan
page.content: Elmvale Primary School was opened in 1981 and has{210 pupils}aged {between five and twelve.}There are {eight teachers}and a headteacher, a secretary and a janitor. The school is{semi_open plan}with seven teaching areas opening off a large central hall. The building is of {brick}with the interior finished in {wood}and{plaster.}The floors are covered with{vinyl, clay tiles}or {carpets,}and the furniture is made of {wood, metal and plastic.}There are {concrete_covered}play areas outside and two{grass_covered}fields. The school{kitchen}employs four people (some part_time), and meals are served in the middle of the day to about one hundred pupils and staff. The building is{heated by warm air heated by{gas.
